title: Fushouji Idol
sinopse:
"Let's prove to them that we can still do it!" Kiyoshi Shinonome, a former top idol who left the group because of a scandal. Issei Kaburagi, who immediately retired after the debut interview. Rui Tachibana and Tamotsu Hanagasa, a pair of childhood friend who ruined a lot of TV programs. These four Idols who once disappeared from the scene gathered and made a debut known as "SCaNDaL!"

(Source: Hakusensha, translated)
